item.title: 5 Musings after Surviving my First Year as an SRE
item.description: I recently completed my first year as an SRE on Cloudvision as a Service team with Arista Networks, which is our core customer facing cloud service product. Working with infrastructure, building automation, doing ops, and the rest of the rodeo is nothing new to me, but doing so as an SRE to a customer facing product was a completely new ball game with entirely different set of risks, costs, mindset, and business impact to think of.
